# gitea_repository_key (Resource)

Manages a repository deploy key



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) An armored SSH key to add
- `owner` (String) Owner of the repository
- `repository` (String) Name of the repository
- `title` (String) Title of the key

### Optional

- `read_only` (Boolean) Whether the key has only read access or read/write

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the key was created
- `fingerprint` (String) Fingerprint of the key
- `id` (Number) The ID of the deploy key
